meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing articles on various topics, usually arranged in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: I found interesting facts in encyclopedias at the library.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother gifted me a set of encyclopedias for my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopedias on the shelf whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a vast collection of encyclopedias, full of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopedias in the classroom were like treasure chests waiting to be opened.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work providing information on all branches of knowledge.
meanings.sent1: Students use encyclopedias to research different subjects.
meanings.sent2: The encyclopedias in the library cover a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopedias at the bookstore had a party after closing time.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a living encyclopedia, always ready with answers.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopedias in the study room were like wise old sages, ready to impart knowledge.
